metadata.name: Disbursement Channel
metadata.description: Categories of information included in published documents

data.name: Money is disbursed through central Ministry of Finance or Treasury
data.description: Money is disbursed through central Ministry of Finance or Treasury

data.name: Money is disbursed directly to the implementing institution and managed through a separate bank account
data.description: Money is disbursed directly to the implementing institution and managed through a separate bank account

data.name: Aid in kind: Donors utilise third party agencies, e.g. NGOs or management companies
data.description: Aid in kind: Donors utilise third party agencies, e.g. NGOs or management companies

data.name: Aid in kind: Donors manage funds themselves
data.description: Aid in kind: Donors manage funds themselves
